title: Display
description: Display information for a payment instrument.

brand.description: The card brand/network (e.g., visa, mastercard, amex).

last_digits.description: Last 4 digits of the card number.

expiry_month.description: The month of the card's expiration date (1-12).

expiry_year.description: The year of the card's expiration date.

description.description: An optional rich text description of the card to display to the user (e.g., 'Visa ending in 1234, expires 12/2025').

rich_text_description.description: Alternative field name for description, used in some contexts.

card_art.description: An optional URI to a rich image representing the card (e.g., card art provided by the issuer).
